author: taylor
msg: I've broken something in the generation of the JS.p. Im going to just check in a hard-coded version for now.
If you do "ant clean compile", it will break it again, so beware...
You can copy this line back in :

author: taylor
msg: - Completed basic conversion of Jetspeed to new security model.
- Converted standard actions to use JetspeedSecurity and decouple from TurbineSecurity.
- Disabled ACL checks. Jetspeed runs much faster without it.
4. Sufficient privilege checks on all security methods
5. Global setting to turn off all portlet security checks during aggregation
